Verses: 1 dhaaveedhu Keesin Kumaaranaagiya Savulinimiththam Innum Maraivaayirukkaiyil, Siklaagilirukkira Avanidaththirku Vandhu,

2 yuththaththirku Oththaasai Seydha Vilveerarum, Kavankal Erigiradharkum Villinaal Ambu Eygiradharkum Valadhu Idadhu Kaivaattamaana Paraakkiramasaaligalaana Matra Manusharumaavana: Savulin Sagodhararaagiya Benyameen Koththiraththil,
3 kibeyaa Ooraanaagiya Semaavin Kumaarar Agiyesar Ennum Thalaivanum, Yovaasum, Asmaaveththin Kumaararaagiya Esiyelum, Peleththum, Peraakkaa, Aanadhoththiyanaana Ekoo Enbavargalum,
4 muppadhuperil Paraakkiramanum Muppadhuperukkup Periyavanumaana Ismaayaa Ennum Kibiyoniyanum, Eremiyaa, Yagaasiyel, Yoganaan, Kedherooraanaana Yosabaadh,
5 elusaayi, Erimodh, Pigaliyaa, Semariyaa, Aruppiyanaana Seppaththiyaa,
6 elkkaanaa, Eshiyaa, Asaariyel, Yoveser, Yasopeyaam Ennum Koregiyarum,
7 yovelaa, Sepadhiyaa Ennum Kedhor Ooraanaana Erogaamin Kumaararume.

8 kaaththiyaril Parisaiyum Eettiyum Pidiththu, Singamugam Pondra Mugamum, Malaigalilirukkira Velimaan Vegampondra Vegamumullavargalaayirundhu, Yuththasevagaraana Paraakkiramasaaligal Silarum Vanaandharaththilulla Aranaana Idaththil Irukkira Dhaaveedhu Patchamaai Serndhaargal.
9 yaarendraal, Edhser Ennum Thalaivan, Avanukku Irandaavadhu Opadhiyaa; Moondraavadhu Eliyaab,
10 naalaavadhu Mismannaa, Aindhaavadhu Eremiyaa,
11 aaraavadhu Aththaayi, Ezhaavadhu Eliyel,
12 ettaavadhu Yoganaan, Onpadhaavadhu Elsabaadh,
13 paththaavadhu Eremiyaa, Padhinoravadhu Makpannaayi;
14 kaadh Puththiraraana Ivargal Raanuvaththalaivaraayirundhaargal; Avargalil Siriyavan Nooruperukkum Periyavan Aayiramperukkum Servaikkaararaayirundhaargal.
15 yordhaan Karaipurandupoyirukkira Mudhalaam Maadhaththil Adhaik Kadandhu, Kizhakkeyum Merkeyum Pallaththaakkugalil Irukkira Yaavaraiyum Thuraththivittavargal Ivargale.
16 pinnum Benyameen Puththirarilum Yoodhaapuththirarilum Silar Aranaana Sthalaththil Irukkira Dhaaveedhinidaththil Vandhaargal.

17 dhaaveedhu Purappattu, Avargalukku Edhirkondupoi, Avargalukku Uththaravukoduththu: Neengal Enakku Udhaviseyya Samaadhaanamaai Ennidaththil Vandheergalaanaal, En Irudhayam Ungalodu Isaindhirukkum; En Kaigalil Kodumai Illaadhirukka, Ennai En Saththurukkalukkuk Kaattikkodukka Vandheergaleyaagil, Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalin Dhevan Adhaip Paarththuk Kandippaaraaga Endraan.

18 appozhudhu Adhipadhigalukkuth Thalaivanaana Amaasaayinmel Aavi Iranginadhinaal, Avan: Dhaaveedhe, Naangal Ummudaiyavargal; Eesaayin Kumaarane Umadhu Patchamaayiruppom; Umakku Samaadhaanam, Samaadhaanam; Umakku Udhaviseygiravargalukkum Samaadhaanam; Ummudaiya Dhevan Umakkuth Thunai Nirkiraar Endraan; Appozhudhu Dhaaveedhu Avargalai Serththukkondu, Avargalaith Thandukkuth Thalaivaraakkinaan.

19 savulinmel Yuththampannappogira Pelistharudanekooda Dhaaveedhu Varugirapodhu, Manaaseyilum Silar Avan Patchamaai Serndhaargal; Pelistharin Prabukkal Yosanaipanni, Avan Nammudaiya Thalaigalukku Mosamaaith Than Aandavanaagiya Savulin Patchamaaip Povaan Endru Avanai Anuppivittaargal: Adhanaal Avargal Ivargalukku Udhaviseyyavillai.

20 appadiye Avan Siklaagukkuth Thirumbippogaiyil, Manaaseyil Adhnaag, Yosabaadh, Edhiyaavel, Migaayel, Yosabaadh, Elikoo, Silththaayi Ennum Manaase Koththiraththaarin Aayiraththu Servaikkaarar Avan Patchamaai Vandhaargal.
21 andhath Thandukku Virodhamaai Ivargal Dhaaveedhukku Udhaviseydhaargal; Ivargalellaarum Paraakkiramasaaligalum Raanuvaththil Servaikkaararumaayirundhaargal.
22 akkaalaththile Naalukkunaal Dhaaveedhukku Udhaviseyyum Manushar Avanidaththil Vandhu Serndhapadiyaal, Avargal Dhevasenaiyaippola Magaa Senaiyaanaargal.
23 karththarudaiya Vaakkinpadiye, Savulin Raajyabaaraththai Dhaaveedhinidamaaith Thiruppa, Epronilirukkira Avanidaththukku Vandha Yuththasannaththaraana Thalaivarin Lakkamaavana:
24 yoodhaapuththiraril Parisaiyum Eettiyum Pidiththu, Yuththasannaththaraanavargal Aaraayiraththu Ennooruper.
25 simiyon Puththiraril Paraakkiramasaaligalaagiya Yuththaveerar Ezhaayiraththu Nooruper.
26 levi Puththiraril Naalaayiraththu Arunooruper.
27 aaron Sandhadhiyaarin Adhipadhiyaagiya Yoyadhaavum, Avanodirundha Moovaayiraththu Ezhunooruperum,
28 paraakkiramasaaliyaana Saadhok Ennum Vaalibanum, Avan Thagappan Vamsaththaaraana Irubaththirandu Thalaivarume.
29 benyameen Puththiraraana Savulin Sagodhararil Moovaayiramper; Adhuvaraikkum Avargalil Michchamaanavargal Savulin Kudumbaththaik Kaappaatrap Paarththaargal.
30 eppiraayeem Puththiraril Thangal Pidhaakkalin Vamsaththil Perpetra Manusharaana Paraakkiramasaaligal Irubadhinaayiraththu Ennooruper.
31 manaaseyin Paadhikkoththiraththil Dhaaveedhai Raajaavaakkugiradharku Varumpadi, Perperaagak Kurikkappattavargal Padhinennaayiramper.

32 isakkaar Puththiraril, Isravelar Seyyavendiyadhu Innadhendru Arindhu Kaalaakaalangalukkuth Thagundha Yosanai Sollaththakka Thalaivargal Irunooruperum, Ivargal Vaakkukku Sevikoduththa Ivargaludaiya Ellaa Sagodhararume.

33 sebulon Puththiraril Sagalavidha Yuththa Aayudhangalaalum Yuththam Seygiradharkum, Thangal Aniyaik Kaaththunirkiradharkum Pazhagi, Vanjanaiseyyaamal Yuththaththirkup Pogaththakkavargal Aimbadhinaayiramper.
34 napthali Puththiraril Aayiram Thalaivargal Parisaiyum Eettiyum Pidiththa Avargalodekooda Irundhavargal Muppaththezhaayiramper.
35 thaan Puththiraril Yuththaththirkuth Therinavargal Irubaththu Ennaayiraththu Arunooruper.
36 aaser Puththiraril Yuththaththirkuth Therinavargalaai Sevagampannappogaththakkavargal Naarpadhinaayiramper.
37 yordhaanukku Akkaraiyaana Roobaniyarilum, Kaaththiyarilum, Manaaseyin Paadhikkoththiraththaarilum, Yuththampanna Sagalavidha Aayudhangalaiyum Thariththavargal Nootrirubadhinaayiramper.

38 dhaaveedhai Isravelinmel Raajaavaakkugiradharku, Indha Yuththamanushar Ellaarum Ani Aniyaai Vaikkappattavargalaaga, Uththama Irudhayaththode Epronukku Vandhaargal; Isravelil Matra Yaavarum Dhaaveedhai Raajaavaakkugiradharku Orumanappattirundhaargal.
39 avargal Ange Dhaaveedhodekooda Moondrunaal Irundhu, Pojanabaanampanninaargal; Avargal Sagodharar Avargalukkaaga Sagalaththaiyum Aayaththampanniyirundhaargal.

40 isakkaar, Sebulon, Napthaliyin Ellaimattum Avargalukku Sameebamaayirundhavargalum, Kazhudhaigalmelum Ottagangalmelum Koveru Kazhudhaigalmelum Maadugalmelum, Thinpandangalaagiya Maa, Aththippazha Adaigal, Vatralaana Dhraatchappazhangal, Dhraatcharasam, Enney Aadumaadugal Aagiya Ivaigalai Vendiya Mattum Etrikkonduvandhaargal; Isravelile Magizhchchiyundaayitru.
